title: World Music Traditions Quiz
description: How well do you know traditional music styles and genres from around the world?

questions.question: Flamenco music, featuring passionate guitar and vocals, originated in which region of Spain?
Reggae music originated in which Caribbean island nation in the late 1960s?
Throat singing (Khoomei), producing multiple pitches simultaneously, is traditional in which region?
Fado, a melancholic music genre expressing longing and nostalgia, is the national music of which country?
The blues, which influenced rock and roll, originated among which community in the American South?
Bhangra is a lively folk music and dance tradition from which region of South Asia?
Mariachi music, featuring trumpets, violins, and guitars, is a beloved tradition of which country?
The raga is a melodic framework central to the classical music of which country?
Calypso music originated in which Caribbean nation and often features satirical lyrics?
K-pop, the globally popular music genre, originated in which country?
The tango, as both a dance and music genre, developed in the border region between which two countries?
Gamelan, an ensemble music featuring metallophones and gongs, is central to the culture of which country?
Celtic music, featuring fiddles, tin whistles, and harps, is traditional in which regions?
The samba is a Brazilian music genre with roots in which cultural tradition?
Qawwali, a form of devotional Sufi music, is especially prominent in which countries?
